name: TKTokenDriver
desc: A base class for building token drivers.

items.name: protocol TKTokenDriverDelegate
items.desc: The interface that a token driver delegate implements to respond to token creation events.

items.name: typealias TKTokenDriver.ClassID
items.desc: The type of the class identifier for the token driver.

items.name: class TKTokenDriver.Configuration
items.desc: A configuration for one class of token.
